title: Radisson Hotel Group expands portfolio with Svelte Delhi, to be operational by Q3 2024
description: Radisson Hotel Group has inked a deal to add the 108-room Svelte Delhi, a member of Radisson Individuals, to its portfolio. Expected to be operational by Q3 2024, the hotel aims to create over 100 job opportunities. Located in South Delhi's Saket district, the hotel offers easy access to major tourist attractions and corporate hubs.
